title: Statement by the President on the Departure of Deputy Secretary of Commerce Dennis Hightower | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
July 15, 2010

 



Statement by the President on the Departure of Deputy Secretary of Commerce Dennis Hightower




I thank Dennis for his service to the country and to my Administration. I appreciate his guidance and hard work on various important priorities – from expanding broadband Internet access across the country to reforming our export control system in a way that enhances our competitiveness and our security.  I wish him the best in his future endeavors.
